main event: A Dutch engineer testing voltage lines on the roof of a factory observed and photographed a bright light that he identified as a flying saucer. The object affected the measuring instruments the engineer was using.
interesting points: The object was described as a 'flying saucer'.
The object affected the measuring instruments the engineer was using.
The report includes a 35mm slide from the Royal Netherlands Meteorological Institute, a photo-montage comparing the photographs, and sketches/notations made by the observer.
The newspaper 'Nieuws van de Dag' reported on a similar incident where a young radio mechanic photographed a circular metallic object that hovered and moved rapidly.
The experts could not explain the large size of the object shown in the photograph by any known astronomical or physical phenomenon.
sighted object: a bright light identified as a 'flying saucer'
